duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete material movement throughout the facility and grounds by using forklift and, or pallet jack.
Pull specific vending and cold drink equipment to fulfill sales request needs.
Ensure the security and safety of outbound loads, load and unload trailers, and update documentation for accountability of inbound and outbound loads.
Conduct safety and housekeeping activities, review daily documentation for accuracy, and keep the work area neat and clutter-free.
Assist with staging equipment and other movements, including junking equipment and yard maintenance. Utilize a switcher to maneuver trailers to the dock as needed.
